text: Anna-Lisa Frykman born Anna Elisabet Frykman on 4 January 1889 in Stockholm, Sweden, dead 14 June 1960 in Stockholm, Sweden was a Swedish composer, song lyricist and teacher. One of her most famous works is the children's song Kungens lilla piga. She also wrote the Christmas song Julpolskan. She was also active under the pseudonym "Eolus". == References == Category:1889 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Musicians from Stockholm
title: Anna-Lisa Frykman
